activity-date.narrative: Update on growth fund David Johnson provided update of the Growth fund. During 2019 WorldVeg has used $338,000 to support critical science positions, hire consultants for fund raising and for travel and other costs related to resource mobilization. A total of 27 project proposals have been developed from the efforts supported by the Growth Fund. This has resulted in 13 funded proposals, generating a total project funding of $12.4 Million giving an estimated annual 8-folds return of investment. 2020 OP and Budget David Johnson presented summary 2020 OP and its budget. The following achievements are reported: a list of key performance indicators was developed and proposed as a measure of annual performance, as of 1 November 67% of annual deliverables was achieved and an App was developed to combine Smartsheet database of deliverables across flagships and the annual operational plan. The proposed KPIs are: number of technologies in different phases of R&D continuum, number of peer-reviewed publications, restricted project fundraising, number of students/professionals/post-doctoral fellows as a performance indicator of open science center, and Enabling Impact-specific indicators for impact evaluation.
